title: substitution of the following definition for the definition of “EC Cross Border
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Cross Border Payments) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 24 August 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european community (cross border payments) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 24 august 2021

title: substitution of the following definition for the definition of “EC Cross Border
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Cross Border Payments)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Cross Border Payments) 
Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 183 of 2010) is amended in paragraph (1) by the 
substitution of the following definition for the definition of “EC Cross Border 
Payments Regulation”: 

“ ‘EC Cross Border Payments Regulation’ means Regulation (EU) No. 
2021/1230 of the European Parliament and of the Council dated 14 July 
20212;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 August, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L274, 30.07.2021, p. 20 
2 OJ No. L274, 30.07.2021, p. 20 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th August, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [417] 3
